item.title: CVE-2024-22267|2024-05-14T12:58:31.261Z -- na -- vmware%20workstation
item.description: VMware Workstation and Fusion contain a use-after-free vulnerability in the vbluetooth device.Â A malicious actor with local administrative privileges on a virtual machine may exploit this issue to execute code as the virtual machine's VMX process running on the host.
